Description.Text: Elegy is a basic 3-star hotel offering comfortable accommodation in the heart of St. Petersburg. Highlights include free Wi-Fi, a communal kitchen and an excellent location close to Vosstaniya Square. Nevsky Prospekt is a grand avenue lined with an array of beautiful, historic buildings. Nearby places of interest include Vosstaniya Square, the Art Nouveau Singer House, Moskovsky railway station and the Great Gostiny Dvor, an 18th-century shopping mall. Dostoyevskaya metro station is located in the vicinity, providing fast and easy access to other popular St. Petersburg destinations. The hotel occupies a striking mid-rise property with a large turret. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Standard rooms are 17sqm and decorated in a bright, classic style. Amenities include air-conditioning and a TV. The en-suite bathrooms feature a bathtub or shower. The hotel boasts a communal kitchen where guests can prepare individual meals, and a buffet breakfast is provided every morning. There are plenty of dining opportunities in the vicinity. The hotel has a 24-hour reception. Free parking is possible nearby.
